id.description: A unique identifier for the process.

name.description: A descriptive name for the process.

type.description: The category or classification of the process, such as 'reaction', 'transport', etc.

attributes.description: A dictionary of key-value pairs representing the process's properties. Supports numbers, strings, booleans, arrays, or nested objects.

oneOf.description: A numerical attribute of the process.
A string attribute of the process.
A boolean attribute of the process (true/false).
An array of numbers representing different numeric properties of the process.
An array of strings representing different string properties of the process.
An array of booleans representing different on/off states for the process.
A nested object representing a complex attribute or struct related to the process.

participating_objects.description: A list of objects involved in this process, identified by their object type.

dynamics.description: Describes the dynamic behavior of the process, such as rates of change or interaction types.

type.description: The type of dynamics, such as 'rate', 'interaction', etc.

rate.description: The rate or speed of the dynamic process.

events.description: A list of events that can occur as part of the process, each with a name and trigger condition.

trigger.description: The condition that triggers the event, such as a threshold being met or an external signal.

description: This schema defines a process in a simulation, including its associated objects, attributes, dynamics, and events. Either dynamics or events must be provided for the process.
